definition: to split/to crack/to break open/to rend

sentences.english: A brief discussion has been made in the clinical diagnosis and the causes of misdiagnosis in the first branchial cleft diseases.
sentences.chinese: 文章阐述了第一鳃裂囊肿的临床诊断及其误诊原因。

sentences.english: Bilateral branchial cleft fistulas are uncommon, but the incidence is higher in the same family.
sentences.chinese: 双侧鳃裂异常临床上较为罕见，且常有家族遗传倾向。

sentences.english: Branchial cleft cyst had the relatively fixed location and hadn't been enhanced.
sentences.chinese: 鳃裂囊肿有其相对固定的发病部位，增强扫描无强化。

sentences.english: Consulsion:Surgical resection was the main method to treat the congenital branchial cleft cysts.
sentences.chinese: 手术切除仍为治疗鳃裂畸形的主要方法。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the clinical feature and prognosis of primary branchial carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨原发性鳃裂癌临床特点及预后。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the significance of dissection of the facial nerve in resection of the first branchial fistula.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨面神经解剖在第一鳃裂瘘管切除术中的意义。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the recognization and the diagnostic accuracy of brachial cleft cyst (BCC) by CT scan.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高对鳃裂囊肿CT表现的认识和诊断准确率。

sentences.english: The second branchial fistula and thyroglossal fistula are relatively common lesions.
sentences.chinese: 第二鳃裂瘘和甲状舌管瘘在临床上较为常见。

sentences.english: IV. They present a propulsive tail, pharynx and branchial openings.
sentences.chinese: 它们有一条推进用的尾巴，咽及鳃裂。

definition: visceral arch (gill-bearing arch or its vestigial crease on sides of neck of vertebrates)
bony fishes/Osteichthyes (taxonomic class including most fish)
cartilaginous fishes/Chondrichthyes (taxonomic class including sharks and rays)
